title: i18n support
description: The application has a built-in i18n support.

title: Job execution UI
description: Administrators can check all background job executions on a new UI.

title: Enhanced messages page
description: Messages now can be marked as read/unread and can be deleted as well

title: Basic GDPR user deletion(RTBF) feature
description: Basic level features for GDPR RTBF has been implemented, so GDPR maintenance systems/DPO can request to delete the given user(s) data from Give My Secret via REST API

title: Basic Keycloak SSO feature
description: Basic level features for Keycloak SSO has been implemented, so users can log in with their Keycloak realm users. Currently the only limitation is the lack of 2FA functionality. This will be implemented in the future.

title: IP restriction feature
description: Global and secret level IP address restriction feature has been added to Give My Secret to limit the API consumers by their IP addresses.

title: Improvements in LDAP mode
description: Major improvements and bugfixes done in the LDAP mode to remove any concerns. However, currently user edition in LDAP mode is not supported.

title: Password reset feature
description: From this version blocked/disabled users can request password reset from administrators.

title: User block feature
description: Users can be blocked after X failed attempts if they cannot provide their credentials properly. Only administrators can unblock them. There is a task in the GMS backlog on GitHub to implement a feature to let the users request unlock their account.

title: What's new in January 2024
description: The development of the Give My Secret continues in 2024! The first new feature is this system announcement board where you can check the recent changes of the application in the future.
